statements: SELECT * FROM public_opinion_sentiment_analysis;
SELECT id, social_media_post FROM public_opinion_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT social_media_post, sentiment_score FROM public_opinion_sentiment_analysis WHERE id < 100 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT id, social_media_post, sentiment_score FROM public_opinion_sentiment_analysis WHERE social_media_post LIKE '%positive%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, social_media_post, sentiment_score FROM public_opinion_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_sentiment_analysis WHERE id = 1;
SELECT social_media_post, sentiment_score FROM public_opinion_sentiment_analysis;
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_sentiment_analysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT social_media_post, sentiment_score FROM public_opinion_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT id, social_media_post FROM public_opinion_sentiment_analysis WHERE social_media_post LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM social_media_data;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT sentiment_label, opinion, post_id FROM public_opinion WHERE sentiment_label = 'positive';
SELECT opinion_id, sentiment_label FROM public_opinion WHERE sentiment_label = 'negative' ORDER BY opinion_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM public_opinion WHERE sentiment_label = 'positive' ORDER BY opinion_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE post_content LIKE '%#technology%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT opinion_id, opinion, sentiment_label FROM public_opinion WHERE opinion_id IN (SELECT post_id FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2);
SELECT * FROM social_media_data JOIN public_opinion ON social_media_data.post_id = public_opinion.post_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.6;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, category_name FROM SocialMediaPosts JOIN PostSentimentAnalysis USING (post_id) JOIN SentimentCategories USING (category_id);
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT post_id, category_name FROM SocialMediaPosts INNER JOIN PostSentimentAnalysis ON SocialMediaPosts.post_id = PostSentimentAnalysis.post_id INNER JOIN SentimentCategories ON PostSentimentAnalysis.category_id = SentimentCategories.category_id;
SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;

SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date, category_name FROM SocialMediaPosts LEFT JOIN PostSentimentAnalysis ON SocialMediaPosts.post_id = PostSentimentAnalysis.post_id LEFT JOIN SentimentCategories ON PostSentimentAnalysis.category_id = SentimentCategories.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_content FROM social_media_posts JOIN sentiment_analysis_results ON social_media_posts.post_id = sentiment_analysis_results.post_id;
SELECT category_name, emotion_type FROM sentiment_categories;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT category_name, emotion_type FROM sentiment_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_posts JOIN sentiment_analysis_results ON social_media_posts.post_id = sentiment_analysis_results.post_id;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users;
SELECT user_name, account_type FROM social_media_users WHERE account_type = 'Business';
SELECT post_text, user_id, post_timestamp FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM sentiment_categories ORDER BY category_id;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT username, sentiment_score FROM public_opinion_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users WHERE account_type = 'business' ORDER BY user_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_text, sentiment_label FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND post_timestamp <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT category_name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM sentiment_categories INNER JOIN sentiment_analysis_results ON sentiment_categories.category_id = sentiment_analysis_results.category_id GROUP BY category_name;

SELECT p.post_text, u.user_name, s.sentiment_score FROM social_media_posts p INNER JOIN social_media_users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN public_opinion_sentiments s ON p.post_id = s.id WHERE s.sentiment_score > 0.7 ORDER BY s.sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
